sentence.Network_en: He thereupon privately chide his wife for her forwardness in the matter.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是他私下责备他的妻子,因为她对这种事热心.

sentence.Network_en: Have we got any business to chide it?
sentence.Network_cn: 我们有何理由责备它 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: He will not always chide; neither will he keep his anger for ever.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不长久责备, 也不永远怀怒.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... chiaroscuro n. 明暗对照法 chide ? v. 责备 choleric ? adj. 易怒的，暴躁的.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(二)|联想记忆法背单词 ... cherish v. 珍爱 chide v. 斥责 chiefly adj. 主要的，多半的.
松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... riveting:adj. 迷人的 23。 chide ：v. 斥责, 责骂 24。 rubicund ：adj. (脸色, 肤色等)红润的, 透红的 25。.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... chicanery n． 欺诈，欺骗 chide v． 叱责，指责 chimera n． 神话怪物，梦幻.

list.abs: mother chided me for coming home late .母亲责怪我回家太迟。
the presiding judge chided the police forplanting the cellmate and dismissed the evidence as not credible .首席法官斥责警方安插囚友，拒绝承认证据的可信性。
Simon asked , then silently chided himself for interrupting ., Simon 问 , 随即 , 默默责备自己又打断了对方的话.
You ' re being childish , I chided myself ., 太幼稚了 , 我责备自己.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English cīdan, of unknown origin

entry.def: If you chide someone, you speak to them angrily because they have done something wicked or foolish.

example.tran: 克罗斯怨怪自己瞎操心。

example.ex: He gently chided the two women.
example.tran: 他温和地责备了那两名女子。

sentences.sentence: "The mother scolded the child for entering a stranger's car"
"The customer dressed down the waiter for bringing cold soup"

auth_sentence.content: The silver snarling trumpets 'gan to chide.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The silver snarling trumpets 'gan to chide.

auth_sentence.content: It takes the opportunity to chide some politicians for their approach to global problems.
auth_sentence.res_content: It takes the opportunity to chide some politicians for their approach to global problems.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It takes the opportunity to chide some politicians for their approach to global problems.

auth_sentence.content: If you are going to chide someone for having read it, perhaps you should first understand it.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you are going to chide someone for having read it, perhaps you should first understand it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you are going to chide someone for having read it, perhaps you should first understand it.

sentences.en: She was chiding her son for not being more dutiful to her.
sentences.cn: 她在责骂她儿子对她不够孝尽。
